title: I play Ranked to have fun - Banned
body:
why is this a thing?, what happened to "i'm here to crush my enemies and win at all cost, this is war, no one will escape death!"

plus saying "I play for fun" in ranked, is like "gg easy" which gets you a nice chat ban. you are basically grieving your team passively, right after you fed enemy lane with 5 deaths. yet I don't see Riot handling this, so let me do it instead, "Rank is for people who play to win, and advance their division as high as they can before end of season, anything else is for normal/draft".

it's just logical and there is nothing wrong with it..
